title: Gangplank Ult bug
body:
There is a bug on Gangplank which allows you to have 2 Cannon Barrages active at the same time.

How To:
1.Be in shop
2.Ult
3.Buy "Raise Morale" Ultimate upgrade
4.Ult again!

Actually a pretty big bug when you think about it and I haven't seen anyone report or talk about this bug so I'm happy to shed some light on it.
